summary: THE AIRBAG SENSOR LIGHT COMES ON WHENEVER I CHANGE THE POSITION OF THE ADJUSTABLE STEERING WHEEL.  THE VEHICLE WAS NEVER IN AN ACCIDENT.  IT WAS SUPPOSED TO HAVE BEEN CORRECTED BY THE DEALER ON IN MAY OF 2006.  BUT IT HAS RECURRED AND WAS REPORTED TO THE DEALER ON 10/04/2007.  IT OCCURS EVERY TIME I CHANGE THE STEERING WHEEL POSITION. *TR
